## Import the Conlang List

```{python}
# 1) Load the raw text
with open("./conlang.txt", "r", encoding="utf-8") as f:
    text = f.read()
```

## Splitting into Workable Strings

```{python}
import re
list_all = re.split(r"\W+", text)
for i in range(0,len(list_all)-1):
  list_all[i] = list_all[i].lower()


words_all = [w for w in list_all if w]
print(words_all[:15])
```

## Filter by Vowels

```{python}
words_v = []
words_no_v = []
vowels = set("aɜeiou")

for word in words_all:
    if any(ch in vowels for ch in word):
        words_v.append(word)
    else:
        words_no_v.append(word)
```

```{python}
print("First 30 words (with vowels):")
print(words_v[:30])
print()

print("Counts:")
print("  total tokens after edge-punct clean:", len(words_all))
print("  kept (has ≥1 vowel):", len(words_v))
print("  removed (no vowels):", len(words_no_v))
```
